#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int t,n,max1=-1000;string s1,ans;
  map<string,int> m;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
  cin>>s1;
  cin>>n;
    if(m.find(s1)==m.end())m[s1]=n;
    else m[s1]+=n;
    if(m[s1]>max1){max1=m[s1];ans=s1;}
  }
cout<<ans;

}
